pros:

2. Good benefit
3. Positive working environment
cons: Unclear career path for longer term

review_title: Good Ops System and Working Environment
pros: ops system has been developed really well. less paper for submitting requests. they have salary increment and bonus every year, based on your performance assessment. no of leave per year 15. good working environment, lots of great people inside.
cons: low starting salary, contract end when project ends, staff are not considered as an assets, only contractual based.
